name: Picture Perfect Boyfriend: REBOOT
description:
Take a quiz and get matched up with one of four handsome boyfriends!  Meet the wise cracking influencer KADDITION99, or the eccentric gentleman Vincent von Eislied. Spend a relaxing time in the wild with John, or a calm conversation over coffee with Ashton!

Go on a memorable date, make choices that will alter your date, and unlock photos of your good time!

Rebooted and virus free, the "Bureau of Artificial Intelligence and Human Relations" is proud of our greatest endeavor to bring the world of man and machine closer than ever before!

(This is a very short DEMO of the full Picture Perfect Boyfriend game I'm making, this is, more or less, what the final game and menus will look like! It is recommended that you play the first PICTURE PERFECT BOYFRIEND.)
